chapters.title: Chapter 7: A Matter of Thought
chapters.info: Myrelle Berengari, p. 149 (199)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah with an elliptical face. She is young, and has three Warders named Nuhel, Croi, and Avar, all of which she treats as husbands in defiance of all law and custom, inside the tower and out. She fled the White Tower when Siuan was deposed, along with most of her Ajah. She is one of the six sisters who hold much of the power in Salidar despite not being part of the Hall of the Tower. She is the recipient of Lan's bond after Moiraine's death, bringing her Warder count to four, at least until Nynaeve is ready to have him as a Warder. See also Dromand, Nuhel; Hachami, Avar; Makin, Croi; Mandragoran, Lan.
